Name: Precursory Cocktail
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
3 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura optional
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest and quarter orange slice wheel..
Express lemon zest twist over the cocktail and discard.
Garnish with quarter orange slice on rim.
Review: The winning cocktail from CLASS magazine Bartender of the Year 2009.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2009 by Tim Philips at Milk & Honey in London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Precursory Cocktail contains 169 calories
